nodes.text: The Battle of the Angor system occurred shortly before the start of the Yuuzhan Vong War. In the battle, the Dozen and Two Avengers under Jedi Knight Kyp Durron attacked smugglers in the Outer Rim Territories' Angor system. It was believed that the smugglers had ties to Senator Fyor Rodan, as he used the battle as one of the excuses against giving further benefits to the Jedi.
